players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found he's mafia. He killed Charlie. Please vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. I was with Alice. I didn't know you had the role."
You: "I heard Bob was with me, but Diana's investigation matches the evidence. Bob is mafia."
Diana: "Bob, you killed Charlie. I saw it. Vote me on you."
Bob: remained silent.
You: "Bob killed Charlie, vote him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found he's mafia. He killed Charlie. Please vote Bob."
You: "I didn't kill Charlie. I was with Alice. I didn't know you had the role."
Alice: "I heard Bob was with me, but Diana's investigation matches the evidence. Bob is mafia."
Diana: "Bob, you killed Charlie. I saw it. Vote me on you."
You: remained silent.
Alice: "Bob killed Charlie, vote him."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.

You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob and found he's mafia. He killed Charlie. Please vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. I was with Alice. I didn't know you had the role."
Alice: "I heard Bob was with me, but Diana's investigation matches the evidence. Bob is mafia."
You: "Bob, you killed Charlie. I saw it. Vote me on you."
Bob: remained silent.
Alice: "Bob killed Charlie, vote him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
